speaker: Customer
text: You have reached out to a voicemail. Please leave a message at the tone.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah from National Collections. I'm calling about your overdue balance.

speaker: Customer
text: If you would like to leave a message, please do so after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Please call us back at one-eight-hundred-two-five-seven-four-oh-four. We can assist you further.

speaker: Customer
text: Press zero to re-record your message, or just hang up.
